::Slayer/Ramulus::

Ramulus groans, getting up from where he'd been blown into a tree. He 
looks around, seeing SnowCat collapse. The missile attacks had 
stopped, but that didn't mean Slayer had left, more likely that he
had 
run out of ammo.

Ramulus walks over to SnowCat, about to kneel by her to check her 
wounds when a bolt of energy hit him, sending him to the ground. 
Slayer's laugh sounds as Ramulus feels something hit him in the ribs.

The Maximal jumps up. "Striker, get a hold of yourself!" he yells, 
dodging another bolt and firing hit anti-chip weapon atwhere the beam 
had come from. The chip that shot dissapeared as it came into contact 
with Slayer.

"For the last time, Maximal," Slayer's voice says, a rocket exploding 
at Ramulus' feet, sending him flying backwards. The Maximal lands on 
his feet, listening to the rest of Slayer's statement, "I am not 
Striker. My name is Slayer."

Something hard hits Ramulus in the face, the Maximal stumbling 
backwards into a tree. Slayer lands and walks toward Ramulus, his 
rocket launchers spinning around to aim and fire at SnowCat.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> SnowCat::
> 
> She was hit by another missle.  As the dust cleared, she layed 
there. 
> She groaned and slowly got up.  Her side had a hole blown through 
> it.  You could see right through her.  She stood onher wobbly legs 
> and looked at Striker as he flew off. "COWARD!" She then looked at 
> the other bots.  She took a step forward and collapsed.  She was 
> having trouble breathing and gasping for breath. Sparks flew out 
from 
> the wires that were showing.  She coughed and moved her front pa
